name: Lucky golf (Ojornag)
description:
How to play:

You can move the dice by clicking and dragging the mouse. When you make a shot the face on which the dice falls will determine the map during that turn, you have to make the best shots not knowing which map will be the next one. 

Credits:

Programming: Ojornag

3d models:

      - Fences: Broken Vector

      - Trees: Gigel

Music: HarumachiMusic

Sfx: Mixkit
